==UseCases==


= ReadAssignment =


|| Use Case || ReadAssignment ||
||Identified || TS2 ||
|| Description: || The ReadAssignment use case models a Teacher or Student viewing an assignment on VINYL. ||
||Actors|| Teacher||
|| Preconditions: || 1. Teacher or Student must be successfully logged in via the LogIn use case. ||
||Flow of Events: ||1. The use case starts when a Teacher or Student selects View Assignment. ||
||                ||2. The Teacher or Student will be asked to select a class from list of options. ||
||                ||3. A list of assignments for that class will be displayed. ||
||                ||4. The Teacher or Student selects an assignment to view. ||
||Post Condition: || 1. The selected assignment will be displayed.||
